alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Riley; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 10:01PM CDT until September 17 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RILEY...NORTHERN WABAUNSEE AND SOUTHERN POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. George, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 955 PM, the Manhattan Airport measured a 67 MPH wind gust. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Manhattan, Wamego, St. Marys, St. George, Belvue and Louisville. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 317 and 323. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
